about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of KAI, a journey of discovery and revelation that winds between the depths of the sea and the infinity of space. Take on the role of Akira, a protagonist determined to discover the truth behind her seemingly harmless mission aboard a spaceship. However, reality turns out to be different than imagined, leading Akira to face intricate mysteries and unravel dark secrets buried in the underwater depths in the search for her best friend.


FEATURES

  • Two-dimensional Exploration: navigate an Open World between the mysterious underwater world and the sidereal cosmic void as Akira embarks on an epic journey full of surprises.

  • Fish Luring: use Akira's different lures to skillfully handle and guide various groups of colorful fish and predators to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles along the way, helping you unlock ancient mechanisms and access new areas, or simply enjoy creating captivating underwater choreographies like a true fishmancer.

  • Engaging Narrative: embark on a compelling and completely original story full of mystery, with unexpected twists and revelations that will change everything.

  • Immersive Sound Design: experience an immersive sound experience with curated underwater sounds and an interactive soundtrack that dynamically adapts to different game situations.

  • Balanced Exploration: explore the underwater depths in complete tranquility and face moments of challenge and reflection while aboard the ship in a balanced paced gaming experience.

  • In-game photography: capture beautiful scenes and striking moments of your journey with the built-in photography feature and share your discoveries and creations with the community.

  • Integrated Interface: maximize immersion with a minimal game interface that blends seamlessly with the gameplay experience.




With KAI get ready for a unique and immersive experience where discovery and exploration blend with tactical management of groups of fish to overcome obstacles and progress through the story. Welcome to an extraordinary journey, where each encounter with new fish and each puzzle solved will bring you closer and closer to the truth hidden behind the veil between ocean and space.
